name: Underworld Unfinished Business 3: The Plain of Jars
storyline: The Lizard King is dead but the other Dark Souls are causing trouble and threatening to send the whole Underworld into chaos. It is believed that the three principle Dark Souls have retreated to the lowest reaches of Lower Hell. Team Anubis were successful in summoning the Ghost Train and now Lara Croft and Demon Smalls are in pursuit of the Dark Souls.
summary: The fourth entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.
